meanings.definition: The quality of being supportive or helpful.
meanings.sent1: Her supportiveness towards her friends is truly admirable.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate your supportiveness during this difficult time.
meanings.sent3: His supportiveness was so overwhelming that he ended up carrying all the groceries by himself.
meanings.sent4: The supportiveness of the community was like a warm blanket on a cold night.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's supportiveness made all the students feel valued and cared for.

meanings.definition: The act of providing assistance or encouragement.
meanings.sent1: The team's supportiveness helped them achieve their goal.
meanings.sent2: In times of need, a little supportiveness can go a long way.
meanings.sent3: The supportiveness of the puppy trying to fetch the ball was endearing.
meanings.sent4: Her supportiveness was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The supportiveness of the volunteers made the event run smoothly.

meanings.definition: The state of being willing to help or assist others.
meanings.sent1: His supportiveness was evident in the way he always lent a helping hand.
meanings.sent2: The supportiveness of the community was heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: The supportiveness of the robot to do chores was both helpful and amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her supportiveness was a beacon of light in a sea of darkness.
meanings.sent5: The supportiveness of the neighbors made the neighborhood feel like a big family.
